title: Pulsefire Ezreal Icon
body: Previously owned Ezreal Ultimate skin, have been waiting for 7 days and still doesn't get Pulsefire Ezreal Icon =(

replies.body: Oh man those delivery poros must have been working overtime last night! I checked for your icons and it seems like you have them now as well!
I went to check for your icons, and it looks like the helper poros must have delivered your icon shortly after you posted! make sure to double check for it now ^_^!
